mapper.select: select a.id, a.shift_name, a.class_name, a.coke_oven_number, a.carbonization_chamber_number, case when ISNULL(a.production_date) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.production_date, '%Y-%m-%d') end as production_date, case when ISNULL(a.planning_production_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.planning_production_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as planning_production_time, case when ISNULL(a.actual_production_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.actual_production_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as actual_production_time, a.coke_current, a.coke_type, a.planning_run_cycle, a.actual_run_cycle, a.single_hole_production, case when ISNULL(b.planning_load_coal_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(b.planning_load_coal_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as planning_load_coal_time, case when ISNULL(b.actual_load_coal_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(b.actual_load_coal_time, '%H:%i:%s') end as actual_load_coal_time, b.coal_current, b.Loading_coal as loading_coal, a.materials_name, b.coal_tower_number from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake a INNER JOIN product_oi_output_performance_manual_coal b ON a.coal_record_id = b.id where (#{condition.shiftName} = '' or a.shift_name = #{condition.shiftName}) and (#{condition.className} = '' or a.class_name = #{condition.className}) and (#{condition.cokeOvenNumber} = 0 or a.coke_oven_number = #{condition.cokeOvenNumber}) and (#{condition.carbonizationChamberNumber} = 0 or a.carbonization_chamber_number = #{condition.carbonizationChamberNumber}) and (#{condition.startDate} = '' or a.production_date >= case when #{condition.startDate} = '' then null else #{condition.startDate} end) and (#{condition.endDate} = '' or a.production_date <= case when #{condition.endDate} = '' then null else #{condition.endDate} end) order by ${condition.order} ${condition.orderby}
